sentences.en: a gentle shampoo for frequent washing
sentences.cn: 供经常洗发用的柔性洗发剂

sentences.en: Bordeaux is on the main Paris-Madrid line so there are frequent trains.
sentences.cn: 波尔多位于巴黎到马德里的铁路主干线上，来往列车频繁。

sentences.en: He took frequent junkets with friends to exotic locales.
sentences.cn: 他经常和朋友们到一些具有异国情调的地方公款游玩。

sentences.en: Machinery was often unprotected and accidents were frequent.
sentences.cn: 机器常裸露着，因此事故频仍。

sentences.en: Research is also advanced by frequent conference to exchange experience.
sentences.cn: 经常开会交流经验也促进了研究工作的发展.

sentences.en: She gives frequent performances of her work, both at home and abroad.
sentences.cn: 她经常在国内外演出自己的作品。

sentences.en: She is a frequent traveller to Belgium.
sentences.cn: 她经常到比利时去旅行。

sentences.en: She was a frequent visitor to the house.
Symptoms included frequent dryness in the mouth.
sentences.cn: 症状包括经常口干舌燥。

sentences.en: The engineer and his son held frequent consultations concerning technical problems.
sentences.cn: 工程师和他的儿子经常就技术问题互相征求意见。

sentences.en: The jet-setting couple made frequent appearances in the gossip columns.
sentences.cn: 这对穿梭于各国的富豪夫妇经常出现在八卦专栏。

sentences.en: The professor has been a frequent target for animal rights extremists.
sentences.cn: 那位教授屡屡受到极端动物保护主义者的抨击。

sentences.en: The sufferer can experience frequent relapses.
There was frequent thunder and lightning, and torrential rain.
They made frequent checks on his respiration, pulse and blood.
sentences.cn: 他们经常检查他的呼吸 、 脉搏和血液.

sentences.en: Trains rushed past at frequent intervals .
Trains rushed past at frequent intervals.

words.tran_cn: 频繁地，经常地；时常，屡次

trans.tran_en: to go to a particular place often
